mapper.select: SELECT B.NO BOARD_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.HIT, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD HH24:MI') ENROLL_DATE, M.NICK MEMBER_NAME, M.PROFILE_IMG MEMBER_PROFILE, COUNT(BI.FILE_URL)-1 AS IMAGE_COUNT, COUNT(R.NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN CLUB C ON B.CLUB_NO = C.NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON B.NO = R.BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_IMAGE_FILE BI ON B.NO = BI.BOARD_NO WHERE C.NO = #{clubNo} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.NOTICE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY B.NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.HIT, B.ENROLL_DATE, M.NICK, M.PROFILE_IMG ORDER BY 5 DESC

SELECT B.NO BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.HIT, TO_CHAR(B.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD HH24:MI') ENROLL_DATE, M.NICK MEMBER_NAME, M.PROFILE_IMG MEMBER_PROFILE, COUNT(R.NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN CLUB C ON B.CLUB_NO = C.NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON B.NO = R.BOARD_NO WHERE C.NO = #{clubNo} AND B.NO = #{boardNo} GROUP BY B.NO, B.MEMBER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.HIT, B.ENROLL_DATE, M.NICK, M.PROFILE_IMG
SELECT NO BOARD_IMAGE_NO , FILE_URL FROM BOARD_IMAGE_FILE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(NO, CLUB_NO, MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{clubNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NO FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CLUB_NO = #{clubNo} ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM BOARD WHERE CLUB_NO = #{clubNo} AND NOTICE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
